component.name: LandSurface
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurface required

component.name: LandSurfaceKeyProperties
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceKeyProperties required

parameter.name: BasicApproximations
parameter.definition: Decription of the basic approximations made in the LandSurface model.

parameter.name: Genealogy
parameter.definition: History of parent models.

parameter.name: CouplingWithAtmosphere
parameter.definition: Definition of property name CouplingWithAtmosphere required

parameter.name: ListOfPrognosticVariables
parameter.definition: Definition of property name ListOfPrognosticVariables required

parameter.name: WaterTreatment
parameter.definition: Definition of property name WaterTreatment required

value.name: All water sent to ocean (with a lag)

constraint.name: if WaterTreatment is "All water sent to ocean (with a lag)"

parameter.name: LagOfWaterDischarge
parameter.definition: Value of the lag duration of the water discharge into ocean.

parameter.name: WaterStorageMethod
parameter.definition: Definition of property name WaterStorageMethod required

component.name: LandSurfaceSpaceConfig
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceSpaceConfig required

parameter.name: Tiling
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Tiling required

constraint.name: if Tiling is "common to all LS subcomponents"

parameter.name: TilingMethod
parameter.definition: Definition of property name TilingMethod required

parameter.name: GridConfig
parameter.definition: Definition of property name GridConfig required

parameter.name: MeanResolution
parameter.definition: Mean horizontal resolution of the land surface model.

parameter.name: GridCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the horizontal grid used for land surface.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Method required

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Definition of property name TimeStep required

component.name: LandSurfaceSoil
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceSoil required

parameter.name: Texture
parameter.definition: Description of the relative clay, sand and silt proportions of the soil

parameter.name: Structure
parameter.definition: Description of the aggregate characteristics of the soil particles

parameter.name: Albedo
parameter.definition: Ratio of reflected to incoming solar radiation on a land surface

parameter.name: WaterTable
parameter.definition: Description of the level of water saturation within the soil layer

component.name: LandSurfSoilHydrology
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfSoilHydrology required

parameter.name: SpecificTiling
parameter.definition: Definition of property name SpecificTiling required

parameter.name: NumberOfGroundWaterLayers
parameter.definition: Definition of property name NumberOfGroundWaterLayers required

parameter.name: WaterStorageMethod
parameter.definition: Definition of property name WaterStorageMethod required

parameter.name: NumberOfGroundIceLayers
parameter.definition: Definition of property name NumberOfGroundIceLayers required

parameter.name: IceStorageMethod
parameter.definition: Definition of property name IceStorageMethod required

parameter.name: Permafrost
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Permafrost required

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Method required

constraint.name: if Method is "differentiated drainage and runoff"

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Processes required

component.name: LandSurfSoilHeatTreatment
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfSoilHeatTreatment required

component.name: LandSurfaceSnow
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceSnow required

parameter.name: SpecificTiling
parameter.definition: Definition of property name SpecificTiling required

parameter.name: NumberOfSnowLayers
parameter.definition: Definition of property name NumberOfSnowLayers required

parameter.name: SnowAlbedo
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of the ratio of reflected to incoming solar radiation on a snow surface

parameter.name: SnowDensity
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of snow density

parameter.name: SnowWaterEquivalent
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of the 'snow water equivalent'

parameter.name: SnowHeatContent
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of the heat content of snow

parameter.name: SnowTemperature
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of snow temperature

parameter.name: SnowLiquidWaterContent
parameter.definition: Definition of property name SnowLiquidWaterContent required

parameter.name: SnowCoverFractions
parameter.definition: Definition of property name SnowCoverFractions required

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Implemented snow-related processes

parameter.definition: Vegetation interception of rainwater represented?

parameter.name: BiomeTypes
parameter.definition: Names of biomes represented

parameter.name: Phenology
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of vegetation phenology

parameter.definition: Definition of property name BioGeography required
